data.title: Zhanazhol Oil and Gas Field (Kazakhstan)
data.meta_description: Zhanazhol Oil and Gas Field (Жанажол) is an operating oil and gas field in Kazakhstan.
data.text:
This article is part of the Global Oil and Gas Extraction Tracker, a Global Energy Monitor project. Related categories:

Oil and gas extraction

Oil and gas pipelines

LNG terminals

Zhanazhol Oil and Gas Field (Жанажол) is an operating oil and gas field in Kazakhstan.

Project Details

Table 1: Field-level project details for Zhanazhol Oil and Gas Field

*Final Investment Decision Unit name Status Operator Owner Discovery year FID* year Production start year Zhanazhol Operating[1] CNPC - Aktobemunaigas[2] CNPC (100.0%)[3] 1978[4] – 1987[4]

Table 3: Production from Zhanazhol Oil and Gas Field

million m³/y = million cubic meters per year million bbl/y = million barrels of oil per year million m³ = million cubic meters million bbl = million barrels of oil Category Fuel Description Quantity Units Data Year Source cumulative production gas 11000 million m³ 2003 [4] cumulative production oil 265.99 million bbl 2003 [4] cumulative production oil and condensate 652.65 million bbl 2020 [7] production gas 79.94 million m³/y 2015 [8] production oil 9.02 million bbl/y 2020 [7] production gas 3811 million m³ 2020 [7]
